lead_paragraph: A.C. Milan opened the defense of its European Champions League title with a 2-1 victory over Benfica yesterday, and Chelsea and 10-man Liverpool settled for 1-1 ties. Chelsea drew with Rosenborg of Norway, and Liverpool tied at F.C. Porto. Also, Real Madrid defeated Werder Bremen, 2-1, with a 74th-minute goal from Ruud van Nistelrooy.
